title: email
body: how do i change my email if i forgot my email password

replies.body: what was ur old email , i can help

Unfortunately if you don't have access to your sign up email you can't change your email on your own. <:(

But we can still help in a ticket! Reach out to our Account team [**over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). There should be a category asking for help with 'account management and changes'. Use that, and Support will be with you soon privately to see if they can help get your email changed securely.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
